faint.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: difficult to see, hear, smell etc
faint.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: feeling weak and as if you are about to become unconscious because you are very ill, tired, or hungry
faint.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The heat made him feel quite faint.
faint.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to suddenly become unconscious for a short time
faint.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Several fans fainted in the blazing heat.
faint.translation[2].definitions[0].exam: She fell down in a faint.
